properties.property: insert into t_za_dw_abss (ssbh, jgbh, czrxm, czsj, czdwdm, czdwmc, czbs, djrxm, djsj, djdwdm, djdwmc, xtmc, sydwmc, ysdw, sydwdz, xtjcqk, afglsx, afxtgly, afxtzsdh, ywrqbjzxt, tcqsl, gdmbs, ydmbs, rqxtlwqk, ywspjkzxt, sgdw, sxjsl, spjkxtlwqk, txbcts, yxqk, xtzj, ywcrkjkzxt, ywdzxcxt, ywtckglzxt,djrjh,czrjh,djrsfzh,czrsfzh) values (#[ssbh], #[jgbh], #[czrxm], to_date(#[czsj],'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #[czdwdm], #[czdwmc], #[czbs], #[djrxm], to_date(#[djsj],'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss'), #[djdwdm], #[djdwmc], #[xtmc], #[sydwmc], #[ysdw], #[sydwdz], #[xtjcqk], #[afglsx], #[afxtgly], #[afxtzsdh], #[ywrqbjzxt], #[tcqsl], #[gdmbs], #[ydmbs], #[rqxtlwqk], #[ywspjkzxt], #[sgdw], #[sxjsl], #[spjkxtlwqk], #[txbcts], #[yxqk], #[xtzj], #[ywcrkjkzxt], #[ywdzxcxt], #[ywtckglzxt],#[djrjh],#[czrjh],#[djrsfzh],#[czrsfzh])

select ssbh, jgbh, czrxm, to_char(czsj,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') as czsj, czdwdm, czdwmc, czbs, djrxm, to_char(djsj,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') as djsj, djdwdm, djdwmc, xtmc, sydwmc, ysdw, sydwdz, xtjcqk, afglsx, afxtgly, afxtzsdh, ywrqbjzxt, tcqsl, gdmbs, ydmbs, rqxtlwqk, ywspjkzxt, sgdw, sxjsl, spjkxtlwqk, txbcts, yxqk, xtzj, ywcrkjkzxt, ywdzxcxt, ywtckglzxt, djrjh, czrjh from t_za_dw_abss where shbh = ?

select ssbh, jgbh, czrxm, to_char(czsj,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') as czsj, czdwdm, czdwmc, czbs, djrxm, to_char(djsj,'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss') as djsj, djdwdm, djdwmc, xtmc, sydwmc, ysdw, sydwdz, xtjcqk, afglsx, afxtgly, afxtzsdh, ywrqbjzxt, tcqsl, gdmbs, ydmbs, rqxtlwqk, ywspjkzxt, sgdw, sxjsl, spjkxtlwqk, txbcts, yxqk, xtzj, ywcrkjkzxt, ywdzxcxt, ywtckglzxt, djrjh, czrjh from t_za_dw_abss where jgbh = ? and czbs != '3'

update t_za_dw_abss set czrxm = #[czrxm], czrjh = #[czrjh], czsj = to_date(#[czsj],'yyyy-mm-dd HH24:mi:ss'), czdwdm = #[czdwdm], czdwmc = #[czdwmc], czrsfzh = #[czrsfzh], czbs = #[czbs] where ssbh = #[ssbh]

insert into t_za_dw_jfdw (id, jgbh, balx, swdsjktt, sntt, zjbjjmjxt, lwbj, yhbwfdmc, bz,scslsj,badj) values (#[id],#[jgbh],#[balx],#[swdsjktt],#[sntt],#[zjbjjmjxt],#[lwbj],#[yhbwfdmc], #[bz],to_date(#[scslsj],'yyyy-mm'),#[badj])

update t_za_dw_jfdw set jgbh = #[jgbh], balx = #[balx], swdsjktt = #[swdsjktt], sntt = #[sntt], zjbjjmjxt = #[zjbjjmjxt], lwbj = #[lwbj], yhbwfdmc = #[yhbwfdmc], bz = #[bz], scslsj = to_date(#[scslsj],'yyyy-mm'), badj = #[badj] where jgbh = #[jgbh]
delete t_za_dw_jfdw where jgbh = ?
select id, jgbh, balx, swdsjktt, sntt, zjbjjmjxt, lwbj, yhbwfdmc, bz,to_char(scslsj,'yyyy-mm') as scslsj,badj from t_za_dw_jfdw where jgbh = ?

delete t_za_dw_thlgy where jgbh = ?
update t_za_ry_cyry set fkrxm=#[fkrxm], fkrjh=#[fkrjh], fkdwdm=#[fkdwdm], fkdwmc=#[fkdwmc], fksj=sysdate, fknr=#[fknr] where cyrybh=#[cyrybh]

update t_za_ry_cyry set ZXBS='1',ZXRQ=sysdate where sfzh=? and zxbs='0'

select * from ( SELECT org.orgcode, org.orgname, nvl(sum(dzjg),0) AS dzjg, nvl(sum(gx),0) AS gx, nvl(sum(zxxx),0) AS zxxx, nvl(sum(yy),0) AS yy, nvl(sum(sc),0) AS sc, nvl(sum(qy),0) AS qy, nvl(sum(yh),0) AS yh, nvl(sum(sdyq),0) AS sdyq, nvl(sum(zdgc),0) AS zdgc, nvl(sum(wyxq),0) AS wyxq, nvl(sum(qt),0) AS qt, nvl(sum(hj),0) AS hj FROM t_common_organization_sjjs org LEFT JOIN ( SELECT substr(dw.djdwdm,1,6)||'000000' djdwdm, NVL(SUM(DECODE(dm, '001', total)), 0) AS dzjg, NVL(SUM(DECODE(dm, '002', total)), 0) AS gx, NVL(SUM(DECODE(dm, '003', total)), 0) AS zxxx, NVL(SUM(DECODE(dm, '004', total)), 0) AS yy, NVL(SUM(DECODE(dm, '005', total)), 0) AS sc, NVL(SUM(DECODE(dm, '006', total)), 0) AS qy, NVL(SUM(DECODE(dm, '007', total)), 0) AS yh, NVL(SUM(DECODE(dm, '008', total)), 0) NVL(SUM(DECODE(dm, '002', total)), 0) + NVL(SUM(DECODE(dm, '003', total)), 0) + NVL(SUM(DECODE(dm, '004', total)), 0) + NVL(SUM(DECODE(dm, '005', total)), 0) + NVL(SUM(DECODE(dm, '006', total)), 0) + NVL(SUM(DECODE(dm, '007', total)), 0) + NVL(SUM(DECODE(dm, '008', total)), 0) + NVL(SUM(DECODE(dm, '009', total)), 0) + NVL(SUM(DECODE(dm, '098', total)), 0) + NVL(SUM(DECODE(dm, '099', total)), 0)) AS hj FROM (SELECT dic.dm, COUNT(1) AS total, dw.djdwdm FROM t_common_dictionary dic LEFT JOIN (SELECT jbxx.jgbh, hc.dwfl, substr(jbxx.djdwdm,1,6)||'000000' djdwdm FROM t_za_jg_jbxx jbxx LEFT JOIN t_za_dwhc hc ON jbxx.jgbh = hc.jgbh AND hc.nbhc = '1' WHERE jbxx.zxbs = '0' AND jbxx.sfnbgl = '1' #if($djsjstart && !$djsjstart.equals("")) and jbxx.djsj >= to_date(#[djsjstart]||' 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') #end #if($djsjend && !$djsjend.equals("")) and jbxx.djsj <= to_date(#[djsjend]||' 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') #end AND jbxx.djdwdm IS NOT NULL) dw ON dw.dwfl = dic.dm WHERE dic.zdlb = 'ZDY_NBDWLB' GROUP BY dm, djdwdm UNION SELECT '098' AS dm, COUNT(1) AS total, substr(wyxq.djdwdm,1,6)||'000000' djdwdm FROM t_za_wyxq wyxq WHERE wyxq.zxbs = '0' and wyxq.ywwygs = '1' #if($djsjstart && !$djsjstart.equals("")) and wyxq.djsj >= to_date(#[djsjstart]||' 00:00:00','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') #end #if($djsjend && !$djsjend.equals("")) and wyxq.djsj <= to_date(#[djsjend]||' 23:59:59','yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') #end GROUP BY substr(wyxq.djdwdm,1,6)) dw GROUP BY djdwdm) dw ON dw.djdwdm = org.orgcode WHERE org.leve = '3' #if($xzjb && !$xzjb.equals("") && $xzjb.equals("2")) and substr(org.orgcode,1,4)=substr(#[dwdm],1,4) #end #if($xzjb && !$xzjb.equals("") && $xzjb.equals("3")) and substr(org.orgcode,1,6)=substr(#[dwdm],1,6) #end #if($xzjb &&
